meta-review.comment: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2 Turbocharged takes the fun and excitement of the original and cranks it up a notch. The new vehicle classes add complexity and variety, making burning plastic on orange tracks more thrilling than ever. While the challenges and rewards may leave something to be desired, the added depth to the racing experience shines through. With improved gameplay and more events, this sequel is a must-play for arcade racing fans.
